# Vritti UI

> Beautifully designed React components built with Next.js 16, Tailwind CSS v4, and Motion animations.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [Android](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/android): A mockup of an Android device.
- [Animated Beam](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-beam): An animated beam of light which travels along a path.
- [Animated Circular Progress Bar](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-circular-progress-bar): Animated Circular Progress Bar with a percentage value.
- [Animated Content](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-content): Animates content with entrance effects.
- [Animated Gradient Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-gradient-text): An animated gradient background which transitions between colors for text.
- [Animated Grid Pattern](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-grid-pattern): A backgrounds animated grid pattern component
- [Animated List](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-list): A list that animates each item in sequence with a delay.
- [Animated Shiny Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-shiny-text): A light glare effect which pans across text making it appear as if it is shimmering.
- [Animated Theme Toggler](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/animated-theme-toggler): A component for theme changing animation.
- [Antigravity](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/antigravity): Anti-gravity floating animation.
- [Ascii Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/ascii-text): Renders text with an ASCII art style effect using Three.js.
- [Aurora](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/aurora): An aurora borealis background effect with animated light bands.
- [Aurora Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/aurora-text): A beautiful aurora text effect
- [Avatar Circles](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/avatar-circles): Overlapping circles of avatars.
- [Balatro](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/balatro): A psychedelic warping background effect inspired by the game Balatro.
- [Ballpit](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/ballpit): An interactive 3D ball pit physics simulation background.
- [Beams](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/beams): Animated volumetric light beams background effect.
- [Bento Grid](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/bento-grid): Bento grid is a layout used to showcase the features of a product.
- [Blob Cursor](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/blob-cursor): An organic blob cursor that follows the pointer.
- [Blur Fade](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/blur-fade): Blur fade in and out animation.
- [Blur Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/blur-text): Text animation with a blur reveal effect.
- [Border Beam](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/border-beam): An animated beam of light which travels along the border of its container.
- [Bounce Cards](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/bounce-cards): A layouts bounce cards component
- [Bubble Menu](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/bubble-menu): A layouts bubble menu component
- [Card Nav](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/card-nav): A layouts card nav component
- [Card Swap](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/card-swap): A layouts card swap component
- [Carousel](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/carousel): A layouts carousel component
- [Chroma Grid](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/chroma-grid): A layouts chroma grid component
- [Circular Gallery](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/circular-gallery): A layouts circular gallery component
- [Circular Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/circular-text): Text arranged and animated in a circular path.
- [Click Spark](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/click-spark): Spark effect on click events.
- [Client Tweet Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/client-tweet-card): A client-side version of the tweet card.
- [Code Comparison](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/code-comparison): A component which compares two code snippets.
- [Color Bends](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/color-bends): A colorful bending gradient background effect.
- [Comic Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/comic-text): Comic text animation
- [Confetti](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/confetti): Confetti animations for delightful user experiences
- [Cool Mode](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/cool-mode): Cool mode effect for buttons, links, and other DOMs
- [Count Up](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/count-up): Animated number counting up effect.
- [Counter](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/counter): A layouts counter component
- [Crosshair](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/crosshair): A crosshair cursor effect.
- [Cubes](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/cubes): 3D cube animation effect.
- [Curved Loop](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/curved-loop): Marquee text that flows along a curved SVG path.
- [Dark Veil](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/dark-veil): A dark translucent veil overlay background effect.
- [Decay Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/decay-card): A layouts decay card component
- [Decrypted Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/decrypted-text): Text that decrypts itself with a scrambling animation.
- [Dither](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/dither): A dithered gradient background effect with post-processing.
- [Dock](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/dock): An implementation of the MacOS dock using react + tailwindcss + motion
- [Dome Gallery](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/dome-gallery): A layouts dome gallery component
- [Dot Grid](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/dot-grid): An interactive animated dot grid background.
- [Dot Pattern](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/dot-pattern): A background dot pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [Dotted Map](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/dotted-map): A component with a dotted map.
- [Elastic Slider](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/elastic-slider): A layouts elastic slider component
- [Electric Border](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/electric-border): An electric border animation effect.
- [Fade Content](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/fade-content): Content with fade animation.
- [Falling Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/falling-text): Physics-based falling text effect using Matter.js.
- [Faulty Terminal](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/faulty-terminal): A glitchy terminal-style background effect.
- [File Tree](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/file-tree): A component used to showcase the folder and file structure of a directory.
- [Flickering Grid](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/flickering-grid): A backgrounds flickering grid component
- [Floating Lines](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/floating-lines): Animated floating lines background effect.
- [Flowing Menu](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/flowing-menu): A layouts flowing menu component
- [Fluid Glass](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/fluid-glass): A layouts fluid glass component
- [Flying Posters](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/flying-posters): A layouts flying posters component
- [Folder](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/folder): A layouts folder component
- [Fuzzy Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/fuzzy-text): Text rendered with a fuzzy, vibrating canvas effect.
- [Galaxy](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/galaxy): A swirling galaxy background effect.
- [Ghost Cursor](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/ghost-cursor): A ghost trail cursor effect.
- [Glare Hover](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/glare-hover): A glare effect on hover.
- [Glass Icons](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/glass-icons): A layouts glass icons component
- [Glass Surface](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/glass-surface): A layouts glass surface component
- [Glitch Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/glitch-text): Text with a glitch distortion animation effect.
- [Globe](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/globe): An autorotating, interactive, and highly performant globe made using WebGL.
- [Gooey Nav](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/gooey-nav): A layouts gooey nav component
- [Gradient Blinds](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/gradient-blinds): Animated gradient blinds background effect.
- [Gradual Blur](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/gradual-blur): Gradual blur animation effect.
- [Grainient](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/grainient): A grainy gradient background effect.
- [Grid Distortion](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/grid-distortion): An interactive grid distortion background effect.
- [Grid Motion](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/grid-motion): An animated grid motion background with content cells.
- [Grid Pattern](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/grid-pattern): A background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [Grid Scan](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/grid-scan): A grid scanning background effect with optional face detection.
- [Hero Video Dialog](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/hero-video-dialog): A hero video dialog component.
- [Highlighter](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/highlighter): A text highlighter that mimics the effect of a human-drawn marker stroke.
- [Hyper Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/hyper-text): A text animation that scrambles letters before revealing the final text.
- [Hyperspeed](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/hyperspeed): A hyperspeed driving simulation background effect.
- [Icon Cloud](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/icon-cloud): An interactive 3D tag cloud component
- [Image Trail](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/image-trail): Trail of images following the cursor.
- [Infinite Menu](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/infinite-menu): A layouts infinite menu component
- [Interactive Grid Pattern](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/interactive-grid-pattern): A backgrounds interactive grid pattern component
- [Interactive Hover Button](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/interactive-hover-button): A buttons interactive hover button component
- [Iphone](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/iphone): A mockup of the iPhone
- [Iridescence](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/iridescence): An iridescent shimmering background effect.
- [Lanyard](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/lanyard): A layouts lanyard component
- [Laser Flow](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/laser-flow): Flowing laser animation effect.
- [Lens](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/lens): A interactive component that enables zooming into images, videos and other elements.
- [Letter Glitch](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/letter-glitch): A glitchy letter animation background effect.
- [Light Pillar](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/light-pillar): An animated light pillar background effect.
- [Light Rays](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/light-rays): A backgrounds light rays component
- [Lightning](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/lightning): An animated lightning bolt background effect.
- [Line Shadow Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/line-shadow-text): A text component with a moving line shadow.
- [Liquid Chrome](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/liquid-chrome): A liquid chrome metallic background effect.
- [Liquid Ether](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/liquid-ether): A liquid ethereal fluid background effect.
- [Logo Loop](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/logo-loop): Looping logo animation.
- [Magic Bento](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/magic-bento): A layouts magic bento component
- [Magic Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/magic-card): A spotlight effect that follows your mouse cursor and highlights borders on hover.
- [Magnet](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/magnet): Magnetic attraction effect on hover.
- [Magnet Lines](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/magnet-lines): Magnetic lines animation effect.
- [Marquee](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/marquee): An infinite scrolling component that can be used to display text, images, or videos.
- [Masonry](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/masonry): A layouts masonry component
- [Meta Balls](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/meta-balls): Metaballs animation effect.
- [Metallic Paint](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/metallic-paint): Metallic paint animation effect.
- [Meteors](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/meteors): A meteor shower effect.
- [Model Viewer](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/model-viewer): A layouts model viewer component
- [Morphing Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/morphing-text): A dynamic text morphing component.
- [Neon Gradient Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/neon-gradient-card): A beautiful neon card effect
- [Noise](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/noise): Visual noise overlay effect.
- [Number Ticker](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/number-ticker): Animate numbers to count up or down to a target number
- [Orb](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/orb): An animated glowing orb background effect.
- [Orbit Images](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/orbit-images): Images orbiting in a circular path.
- [Orbiting Circles](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/orbiting-circles): A collection of circles which move in orbit along a circular path
- [Particles](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/particles): Particles for adding visual flair to your website.
- [Pill Nav](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pill-nav): A layouts pill nav component
- [Pixel Blast](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pixel-blast): A pixelated blast particle background effect.
- [Pixel Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pixel-card): A layouts pixel card component
- [Pixel Image](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pixel-image): A component that displays an image with a pixelated effect.
- [Pixel Snow](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pixel-snow): An animated pixel snow falling background effect.
- [Pixel Trail](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pixel-trail): Pixelated trail following the cursor.
- [Pixel Transition](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pixel-transition): Pixel-based transition effect.
- [Plasma](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/plasma): An animated plasma fluid background effect.
- [Pointer](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pointer): A component that displays a pointer when hovering over an element
- [Prism](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/prism): A prismatic light refraction background effect.
- [Prismatic Burst](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/prismatic-burst): A prismatic burst of colorful light rays background.
- [Profile Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/profile-card): A layouts profile card component
- [Progressive Blur](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/progressive-blur): Adds a smooth blur gradient effect to scrollable content.
- [Pulsating Button](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/pulsating-button): A buttons pulsating button component
- [Rainbow Button](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/rainbow-button): A buttons rainbow button component
- [Reflective Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/reflective-card): A layouts reflective card component
- [Retro Grid](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/retro-grid): A backgrounds retro grid component
- [Ribbons](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/ribbons): Animated ribbons effect.
- [Ripple](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/ripple): A backgrounds ripple component
- [Ripple Button](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/ripple-button): A buttons ripple button component
- [Ripple Grid](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/ripple-grid): An animated ripple grid background effect.
- [Rotating Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/rotating-text): Animated text that rotates through a list of strings.
- [Safari](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/safari): A safari browser mockup to showcase your website.
- [Scrambled Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/scrambled-text): Text that scrambles on mouse proximity using GSAP.
- [Scroll Based Velocity](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/scroll-based-velocity): Scrolling text whose speed changes based on scroll speed
- [Scroll Float](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/scroll-float): Characters float into view on scroll using GSAP ScrollTrigger.
- [Scroll Progress](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/scroll-progress): Animated Scroll Progress for your pages
- [Scroll Reveal](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/scroll-reveal): Words reveal with opacity and blur on scroll using GSAP.
- [Scroll Stack](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/scroll-stack): A layouts scroll stack component
- [Shape Blur](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/shape-blur): Blurred shape animation.
- [Shimmer Button](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/shimmer-button): A button with a shimmering light which travels around the perimeter.
- [Shine Border](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/shine-border): Shine border is an animated background border effect.
- [Shiny Button](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/shiny-button): A buttons shiny button component
- [Shuffle](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/shuffle): Text characters shuffle and rearrange with a GSAP animation.
- [Silk](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/silk): A flowing silk fabric background effect.
- [Smooth Cursor](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/smooth-cursor): A customizable, physics-based smooth cursor animation component
- [Sparkles Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/sparkles-text): A dynamic text that generates continuous sparkles with smooth transitions.
- [Spinning Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/spinning-text): The Spinning Text component animates text in a circular motion.
- [Splash Cursor](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/splash-cursor): Splash effect cursor.
- [Split Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/split-text): Animated text splitting into characters or words with GSAP.
- [Spotlight Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/spotlight-card): A layouts spotlight card component
- [Squares](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/squares): An animated squares pattern background effect.
- [Stack](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/stack): A layouts stack component
- [Staggered Menu](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/staggered-menu): A layouts staggered menu component
- [Star Border](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/star-border): Animated star border effect.
- [Stepper](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/stepper): A layouts stepper component
- [Sticker Peel](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/sticker-peel): Sticker peel animation.
- [Striped Pattern](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/striped-pattern): A backgrounds striped pattern component
- [Target Cursor](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/target-cursor): A target-style cursor effect.
- [Terminal](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/terminal): A terminal component
- [Text Animate](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/text-animate): A text animation component that animates text using a variety of different animations.
- [Text Cursor](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/text-cursor): Text elements that trail behind the mouse cursor.
- [Text Pressure](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/text-pressure): Variable font text that reacts to mouse proximity with pressure.
- [Text Reveal](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/text-reveal): Fade in text as you scroll down the page.
- [Text Type](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/text-type): Typewriter effect that types and deletes text with a blinking cursor.
- [Threads](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/threads): Animated flowing threads background effect.
- [Tilted Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/tilted-card): A layouts tilted card component
- [True Focus](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/true-focus): Text with an animated focus border that highlights words sequentially.
- [Tweet Card](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/tweet-card): A card that displays a tweet with the author's name, handle, and profile picture.
- [Typing Animation](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/typing-animation): Characters appearing in typed animation
- [Variable Proximity](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/variable-proximity): Variable font text that changes based on mouse proximity.
- [Video Text](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/video-text): A component that displays text with a video playing in the background.
- [Warp Background](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/warp-background): A backgrounds warp background component
- [Waves](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/waves): An animated waves background effect.
- [Word Rotate](https://vritti-ui.dev/docs/components/word-rotate): A vertical rotation of words

## Examples

- [Android Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/special/android/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated Beam Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/animated-beam/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated Circular Progress Bar Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/animated-circular-progress-bar/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated Content Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/animated-content/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated Gradient Text Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/text/animated-gradient-text/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated Grid Pattern Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/backgrounds/animated-grid-pattern/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated List Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/animated-list/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated Shiny Text Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/text/animated-shiny-text/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Animated Theme Toggler Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/animated-theme-toggler/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Antigravity Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/antigravity/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Ascii Text Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/text/ascii-text/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Aurora Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/backgrounds/aurora/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Aurora Text Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/text/aurora-text/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Avatar Circles Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/special/avatar-circles/example.tsx): Example usage

- [Bento Grid Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/layouts/bento-grid/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Blob Cursor Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/blob-cursor/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Blur Fade Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/blur-fade/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Blur Text Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/text/blur-text/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Border Beam Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/border-beam/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Bounce Cards Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/layouts/bounce-cards/example.tsx): Example usage

- [Card Nav Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/layouts/card-nav/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Card Swap Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/layouts/card-swap/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Carousel Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/layouts/carousel/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Chroma Grid Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/layouts/chroma-grid/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Circular Gallery Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/layouts/circular-gallery/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Circular Text Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/text/circular-text/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Click Spark Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/click-spark/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Client Tweet Card Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/special/client-tweet-card/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Code Comparison Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/special/code-comparison/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Color Bends Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/backgrounds/color-bends/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Comic Text Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/text/comic-text/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Confetti Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/confetti/example.tsx): Example usage
- [Cool Mode Example](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti/blob/main/src/registry/components/animations/cool-mode/example.tsx): Example usage

## Optional

- [Repository](https://github.com/satyajitghana/vritti): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://vritti-ui.dev/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
